overview:
Gil Keinan is the founder of 1CS, LLC (www.1cs.com), dba First Class Service, a San Francisco Start-Up that provides high quality contact center support to hotel concierge desks in San Francisco, Los Angeles and Seattle. This is a new opportunity in outsourcing for hotels of all sizes and offers hotel guests access to top notch Concierges who are employed at the best establishments. The company was divested of in 02/2011.

As a hotel professional with over 12 years experience in the U.S., England, Germany, Canada, Mexico and Costa Rica, Gil is best described as a citizen of the world who has multi-cultural leadership experience.

In his hotel career, Gil worked his way around the globe climbing up the ladder from Front Desk Attendant to the position of Rooms Executive of San Franciscoâ€™s most luxurious Hotel & Residence. His responsibilities included annual creation and balance of a significant budget, supervising a management team of 12 who were in charge of over 150 staff, managing an exceptional room product and handling high profile hotel guests, residents and hotel ownership. Gil was part of strategic teams in three new hotel openings, one rebranding and has successfully coordinated several multimillion Capital Expenditure renovation and multi-unit systems upgrade projects.

Gil is also the Chairperson of Probono Advisors, a non-profit organization comprised of accomplished individuals from different trades. The group offers complimentary virtual webcam advice sessions to Start-Ups and struggling young companies around the US.

Gil holds an MBA degree from the Masagung Graduate School of Business at the University of San Francisco, a Masters Certificate in Hospitality Management from eCornell University and a Bachelor of Science (Honors with distinction) in Hotel and Catering Management from the University of Surrey, UK.

A native of Israel, Gil speaks English, German, Hebrew and Spanish fluently. A wine connoisseur, Gilâ€™s other abilities include flying single engine planes, writing mobile phone apps and deep understanding of tech and Social Media.
